mapper.select: select a.id as id, a.jobnumber as jobnumber, a.name as name, a.deptname as deptname, a.isovertime as isovertime, a.deductIntegral as deductintegral, a.startTimeOT as starttimeot, a.endTimeOT as endtimeot, a.wholeNightDate as wholenightdate, a.isWholeNight as iswholenight, a.dataTime as datatime from attendance a ; /* select * from attendance;*/
